remarks: Closure of endomorphism scalar product operation.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2013.)
statement:
tendosp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendosp.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendosp.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendospcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ U e. E /\ F e. T ) -> ( U ` F ) e. T ) $.
